mapper.select: SELECT ti.assetIp,f."name",f.id FROM "bigdata-web".t_asset_info ti RIGHT JOIN "bigdata-web".t_ailpha_network_segment e ON e.relation_type='SECURITY_ZONE' AND ti.assetIpNum BETWEEN e.first_ip AND e.last_ip LEFT JOIN "bigdata-web".t_ailpha_security_zone f ON e.relation_id = f.id WHERE f.id is not null
